column4: For some reason, aptitude is saying that "transmission" is unused and therefor scheduled to be removed, every time I'm installing something. But .. it's really not unused. How can I fix this?
have aptitude remove transmission - then install is again using the .debs you downloaded
I did that before too. Does that mean I have to reinstall transmission everytime I want to install anything? o_O
certainly not.  maybe this helps.   aptitude why-not transmission
